EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_PCF Roadshow_Q314.NYC Email Reminder - Correction
EmailTemplate.subject: Good News! Afternoon Session Pre-Reqs No Longer Required
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Great News,
You are no longer required to create accounts at Cloudbees or Artifactory online for the Pivotal Cloud Platform Workshop. For your convenience, Pivotal will be providing the necessary environment.
Questions? Please contact us via email <mailto:pivotal-operations@pivotal.io> or visit our website <http://www.pivotal.io>.
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
